snippet: Barcelona have agreed to withdraw an appeal against fines imposed by UEFA last year after their supporters waved pro-Catalan independence flags at two matches, European soccer's governing body said on Monday....
lead_paragraph: Barcelona have agreed to withdraw an appeal against fines imposed by UEFA last year after their supporters waved pro-Catalan independence flags at two matches, European soccer's governing body said on Monday.

headline.main: Barcelona Withdraw Appeal Over Fines for Pro-Catalan Flags
headline.print_headline: Barcelona Withdraw Appeal Over Fines for Pro-Catalan Flags
